DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety , tolerability efficacy SU011248 patient non-small cell lung cancer brain metastasis .
DOC.brief_title: Study Tests The Safety And Effectiveness Of SU011248 In Patients With Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer Having Brain Metastases
DOC.criteria: Patients radiologically proven brain metastasis secondary nonsmall cell lung cancer Received previous whole brain radiation therapy none , 1 2 prior systemic therapy treatment advanced/metastatic nonsmall cell lung cancer Patients brainstem lesion , spinal cord compression . carcinomatous meningitis , leptomeningeal disease . Brain metastases > 4 cm linear direction Intracranial intratumoral hemorrhage
